title: Clean Architecture
subtitle: He Quanjie Boey - 6/8/2024
content: Clean Architecture flips the dependency of traditional layered architecture. This decouples the application from the infrastructure and UI/API layers, allowing for more flexibility with regards to making infrastructural changes.

title: Implementing Custom Promises
subtitle: He Quanjie Boey - 6/8/2024
content: Based on an article on Medium, a summary of the article on how to implement a custom promise from scratch in Javascript.

title: Classless Inter-Domain Routing
subtitle: He Quanjie Boey - 6/8/2024
content: Classless Inter-Domain Routing (CIDR) is a way to allocate IP address. A summary on how the CIDR notation works.

title: Angular Basics
subtitle: He Quanjie Boey - 7/8/2024
content: A summarized notes on the basics of Angular.

title: Currying in Javascript
subtitle: He Quanjie Boey - 7/8/2024
content: A summarized notes on how to implement the currying technique in Javascript.

title: Debounce and Throttling in Javascript
subtitle: He Quanjie Boey - 7/8/2024
content: A summarized notes on how to implement the debounce and throttling technique in Javascript. Debouncing and Throttling are used from rate limiting functions.

title: Git Branching Strategy
subtitle: He Quanjie Boey - 7/8/2024
content: An explanation of the commonly used Git Branching strategy. Trunk based and Git flow branching strategies are two popular git branching strategies employed.

title: NextJs Summary
subtitle: He Quanjie Boey - 7/8/2024
content: A very rudimentary summary of the basics of NextJs.

title: Sorting Algorithms in Javascript
subtitle: He Quanjie Boey - 7/8/2024
content: A brief summary of the relatively efficient sorting algorithms in Javascript. Merge and Quick sort basic implementations are shown in Javascript.

title: Spring Security OAuth 2.0
subtitle: He Quanjie Boey - 7/8/2024
content: Notes on how to implement OAuth 2.0 using the Spring Framework in Java.
